about_the_game:
You play as a pyromancer, who awakened on a battlefield and your goal is to reignite a world, in which flames only emit cold.


The Demo contains the first two levels of Blue Flame and shows the core loop of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains small amount of gore and blood.

short_description: Blue Flame is a challenging fast paced top-down action game set in a medieval fantasy world. Take the role of the last pyromancer and restore order to a kingdom in which fires only emit cold.
